column2: Odiliya Residencies - Negombo
column6: There is something special about truly exotic Negombo. The crystal blue lagoon, wide beaches, Dutch Fort, and the Hamilton canal etc., may be taken for granted by the residents but those who have left it in search of greener pastures often return to this place of rest where people are so hospitable and caring. There is no place like Negombo. Odiliya Residencies gated community in Negombo epitomizes the touch of class, superior refinement with luxury. With 32 modern independent luxury houses and 3 bedroom and 4 bedroom designs to choose from, here at Odiliya you have the freedom and privacy to build a family full of love contentment understanding and bond even with your pets.
